tag_list: moalem, social, media, brand, communication, alliances
overview:
Matthew Moalem seasoned industry executive with over 15 years executive management in the Global Software and Internet (Web 2.0) space and focused on technologies like Instant Messaging (Persistent Group Chat), Email (Archiving, Compliance), Enterprise Social Networking, Consumer Social Media, Portals/Collaboration, Knowledge Management, Content Management, and E-Discovery.

One of his main areas of focus now has to deal with social/mobile applications and Cloud/SaaS application development. This includes working with a variety of entertainment, media, social and game publishers around the world to develop new products and strategies.

His area of executive expertise really focuses on building, designing and executing on Global Sales, Marketing and Strategic Alliance programs for up and coming innovative start-ups. Matthew tends to focus on innovative and creative go-to-market strategies to help drive brand awareness and revenue for the organization and the global teams he manage at an accelerated rate. This includes rich viral Web 2.0/Socially enabled marketing, lead generation, pipeline building and global partner eco-systems and strategic alliances.

This includes EMEA, Americas, LATAM and APAC.

milestones.description:
Founder - www.GoKube.com
Innovative thought leader in the Cloud/SaaS technologies, sales and marketing.
